review.title: Nice hotel and location.
review.reviewText: Nice hotel and location. Only bad side is its close to airport so you hear air traffic but it's not that bad. Great location on a bay marina. We stayed to go to a nock land raiders game and wanted to be close to the airport and the BART transit system. Hotel was clean and nice. They had complementary breakfast ever morning. They also had a hotel shuttle that would take you anywhere in a 2 mile radius or to the airport if needed. There's two good restaurants right next to the hotel and a nice big park area. Saw some beautiful sunsets there. Great over all experience.

review.title: outdated hotel
review.reviewText:
This hotel needs improvement, pool was dirty, 
I would not recommend this hotel to anyone
review.positiveRemarks: nothing

review.reviewText: This was the last night on our California road trip and I can't say enough nice things about this hotel.  It is beautiful, close to a very good restaurant, close to Oakland airport, nice walking paths around the marina area and the breakfast was wonderful, the best we had on our ten day road trip.  The staff was very friendly and helpful

review.title: Beautiful views
review.reviewText: The only negative thing was the double beds.  Everything was clean and well maintained.  The staff was very courteous and helpful.

review.title: Perfect hotel by the Marina
review.reviewText: This is our 5th time here at this hotel and we love it.
Quiet and comfortable.  Very nice experience so close to Oakland airport

review.title: Great walking paths
review.reviewText: On the bay.  Nice walking paths.  Nearby restaurants.  Kind of far from other things

review.title: Great Place
review.reviewText: Hotel is in a nice area.  Had a beautiful lobby.  Staff was friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, lobby, free breakfast, staff

review.reviewText: It was pretty nice and quite but i wish the complimentary breakfast include more cooked stuff.
Nice cute hotel. Clean. Friendly staff. Nice hothub and good breakfast.

review.title: Nice quiet hotel!
review.reviewText:
We just felt in love with the place.
It's hard to explain but we felt at peace.
It's would not be the same for everyone. 
It's the feeling of joy and peace that we found there that makes us want to go back one more time.
Let's say, the place is cozy!

review.title: Nice hotel, good free breakfast
review.reviewText: Good experience, hotel was nice and by the water. Staff was nice and courteous and room had a nice view.

review.title: Excellent breakfast
review.reviewText:
Great choices at breakfast

Exercise facility only consists of 3 pieces of cardio equipment

review.title: A tucked-away location, near the Oakland airport
review.reviewText:
The Marina Inn was a pleasant place. I had a nice view of San Francisco Bay. Everything in the room was comfortable. The breakfast was normal for a hotel of this type.

There was an unexpected pleasant surprise of milk and cookies before bed.

I was able to take a nice walk around the Marina. The friend that I was visiting said that the seafood restaurant next door is excellent. If you eat there and mention the hotel, you get a discount.

I didn't mind watching the planes coming in and, with the air conditioning on, didn't hear them either.
review.positiveRemarks: Location.
review.locationRemarks: Nearby seafood restaurant. Nearby airport (with shuttle.) Nice walking path.

review.title: Very very nice hotel, next to a park and trails
review.reviewText: Room was beautiful and had everything we needed; microwave, fridge, iron, hair dryer, and much more! Beautiful view and area

review.title: Extremely Disapointed With View and Check-out
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, enjoyed the free continental breakfast, wifi and parking. Many of the rooms have a view facing the parking lot - this was disappointing as I had requested a waterfront room weeks before stay and was told by hotel staff that it would be no problem and that my request would be placed in the comments. Halfway through our stay we were moved to a waterfront room which was very nice. Added a day to our stay on a separate reservation and it appeared to cause problems including the hotel not wanting to honor the expedia price, even though 5 nights of our stay were via the expedia reservation. We were not complaining, as we had a good stay and enjoyed the hotel, just wanted to pay the price our reservation dictated. This caused our trip to be delayed as the front desk staff told us we had to wait for a manager to come in 15 minutes. After waiting 15 minutes; no manager arrived and we were again told the manager would arrive in 15 minutes from then. This second staff member became argumentative and unpleasant even though I showed her the paperwork displaying my 2 separate reservations and the fees associated with both. Left the hotel feeling very frustrated with how we were treated and likely would not choose this hotel again. Unfortunate, as except for this one incident, the staff were very pleasant and professional.
review.positiveRemarks: The rooms were very nice and the price is very good. Housekeeping staff are excellent.
review.negativeRemarks: Honoring the price dictated in the expedia reservation without difficulty and delay.
review.locationRemarks: Only took 20 minutes to drive to downtown San Francisco at night, however, taxi from SFO airport was $100.

review.title: Excellent hotel the marina is right behind it.
review.reviewText: Excellent!!! The rooms are nice and cozy and they also have a nice balcony.

review.title: Our view was great of the marina.
review.reviewText: We had a great time.  Our T.V. didn't work real well.  But the staff tried to fix it and they couldn't get it to work either.  It kept pixeling out and you couldn't see the picture.  The maids came around a little early for our liking.  The continental breakfast was really nice.  The staff kept it stocked and clean until the very end.  We would definitely stay there again if we are in the area.
review.positiveRemarks: Being on the marina and the views. As well as the continental breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: The wall in the bathroom needed some repair.
review.locationRemarks: The restaurants adjacent to the hotel were great.  It was also nice to be able to walk along the marina and see people fishing.

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: All was very good. There was some noise from planes flying over head due to close proximity to Oakland Airport
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: No
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is about 30 minutes from the hotel there was plenty to see & do there

review.title: Not what i expected. Hampton inn is way better.
review.reviewText: Not what i expected. Hampton inn is way better. Room's too small for the price we paid.

review.title: Nice hotel with good breakfast
review.reviewText: The room was clean and reasonably comfortable. The included breakfast had plenty of options, including some tasty fresh fruit. Staff were courteous and efficient.

review.title: Nice Place To Stay
review.reviewText: This was a pleasant surprise. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. View of the Boat Harbor and across from a golf course. Nice walking area and places to eat. Pool was clean. Breakfast was great. Highly recommended. Will definately come back.
review.positiveRemarks: Most Everything

review.locationRemarks: Golfing, Boating , food. Close to Oracle.

review.title: lovely hotel
review.reviewText: a lovely  room, great facilities, great customer service.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel also offered non stop complimentary refreshments and cookies at tea time and a free shuttle service.
review.locationRemarks: lovely marina and easy access to sanfransisco via free shuttle and train.

review.title: Nice location
review.reviewText: Overlooks the Marina.  Across the street from a golf course and a local park. 2 restaurants next door. Minutes away from the Bart Station and an Outlet Shopping Mall. They serve a nice breakfast, warm cookies with milk after 5pm and the hotel is very quiet.

review.title: weekend getaway
review.reviewText: The internet and phone connection was really bad. The sheets were not changed on our second night. We knew because my husband accidentally spilled ketchup on d sheet and it was still there when we came back from our trip to SFO. This was our 4th time here and this is the worst ever

review.title: Very clean!
review.reviewText: Guest service was very nice! Checking in and checking out was easy. They have a shuttle service that we took to bars down the road. Our driver, Tim was so great! The whole hotel was very clean and the continental breakfast was okay. The cottage cheese and peaches were excellence. Some advice for the continental breakfast: Hard boiled eggs need to be cooked more (they weren't ready), there needs to be milk, and  need Pam spray for the waffle maker needs PAM spray. Overall, I'll be back! It was wonderful!

review.title: Beautiful hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean and comfortable. Delicious breakfast too. It was away from the city of San Francisco, but not terribly far.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, comfortable, really comfortable bed, and great breakfast especially the coffee.
review.negativeRemarks: Don't change a thing
review.locationRemarks: A little off the main attractions but the scenery made up for it

review.title: Nice Clean Hotel
review.reviewText: Spacious Rooms,clean,quiet and bay marina scenery very pleasing. I would definitely stay at this hotel again. Close to airport.

review.title: Nice, quaint hotel on the bay.
review.reviewText: coming from out of state, I was worried about finding the hotel.  Our GPS directions lead us right to the hotel.  The staff were friendly.  The elevator made noises that scared my teenagers.  Breakfast was nice.  It was too chilly the 2 days we were at the hotel, so we didn't get to use the pool.  There are 2 restaurants right next to hotel within walking distance.  The hotel provided a cookie and milk snack in late afternoon/evening, which was a nice touch.  When I needed to go to Walmart, they printed directions off for us.  It is truly the little things that make a difference!  If we ever return to the bay area, definitely will stay here again!

review.title: Good value hotel within easy reach of central SF.
review.reviewText: We chose this hotel as a more economical place than central SF and were very pleased with it.  With hotel shuttle service to the BART station, it was easier to get around than it would have been from many more central hotels.   The room was comfortable, nice light breakfast with good choice and a good heated outdoor pool.
review.positiveRemarks: The bed, the nice setting by the marina, with a good American restaurant next door (no time to try the Mexican one), the pool and the ease of transpor
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast coffee!

review.title: Nice, budget friendly hotel
review.reviewText: Room and accommodations were great. Free continental breakfast. Only slight downfall was a harder than normal bed but not a huge deal at all.

review.title: Nice area
review.reviewText: Nice area not to far to drive or public transportation into San Francisco

photos.caption: Bay trail great for biking, walking, jogging

review.title: Great place to stay when exploring Bay Area
review.reviewText: Comfortable hotel with very friendly and helpful staff. Free amenities (parking, wifi, bikes, breakfast, cookies, fridge, microwave) - no nickel and diming you. Our room had a balcony overlooking the marina. Great walking/biking trail along the bay.  Location was perfect for daily excursions by car or BART to San Francisco, Tiburon and Angel Island, Muir Woods and Stinson Beach, Berkeley, Palo Alto, Monterey. Oakland airport very close, but SFO also nearby.  San Leandro was friendly and also had good grocery stores and restaurants. East Bay traffic was manageable, especially using HOV lane.
Very beautiful hotel. Very nice staff and good breakfast. we will come back.
review.positiveRemarks: everything

review.title: Not a bargain.
review.reviewText: Hotel is in need of some serious updating.  Elevators will scare the living daylight out of you as they screech and crack on every ride up and down.  Beds were too small.
review.positiveRemarks: Complimentary breakfast was pretty good.

review.title: Very clean and nice hotel near airport and marina.

review.reviewText: This was a last minute booking for me as I was stranded at the airport, but was very pleased as it was a great place with a very comfortable room.  They upgraded me and made sure I made the shuttle in time the next day.  Really pleased with the experience and the people were awesome!

review.reviewText: Staff was great, very helpful.  Very convenient if traveling, since do offer the park and fly option.  Restaurants within easy walking distance.  Shuttle to and from airport.

review.title: Perfect!
review.reviewText: I'm not sure why Expedia is rating this hotel at 2.5 stars. The hotel is nice, quiet and very clean. I had a beautiful view of the Bay! I enjoyed my stay and will go there again.

review.title: Good if you want to be out of the way
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, but it is located in a residential area, with only one restaurant choice.  After sitting at my table in that restaurant for over 10 minutes without a waiter even looking in my direction,I left a d had driveway least 5 miles to find something to eat.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet.  A business traveler with business on both sides of the bay bridge would find this to be a quiet haven to use as a base.
review.negativeRemarks: It would be nice if there were some shops or other amenities nearby, other than a golf course.
review.locationRemarks: See above.

review.title: Hospitality done right
review.reviewText: Clean quiet and a welcoming staff.  The price was very good for the service

review.title: Unexpectedly nice hotel near Oakland Airport
review.reviewText: Extremely friendly, helpful staff.  Very clean rooms (though the decor was a bit dated).  Convenient to airport.  Decent breakfast for a hotel breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Great staff; clean hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Rooms could use an update.
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport.

review.title: Close to the fish!
review.reviewText: We stayed just for a night but the staff was so friendly. Mainly the shuttle driver. He was awesome and let us know some fishing tips . He even took us to a great spot right down the street where we caught sting ray, leapord sharks and others. My husband liked the experience so much he wants to come back! We went up there had fun at a warriors game and then had a great time enjoying the weather and the hotel.

review.title: Nice hotel with lots of extras.
review.reviewText: This was a nice little hotel with lots of extras. Friendly staff, good breakfast, cookies in the evening and free bottles of water for the room. It was clean and quiet and perfect for getting a good night's sleep.

review.title: Brilliant location
review.reviewText: Hotel offers a free shuttle service to the cheap rail network for city access (BART) $9 return for each person. Train arrives in the city centre to get easy acces to the Buses, Trams and Cable Cars. The hotel has 2 restuarants within a 5 minute walk. Really safe area.

photos.caption: bathroom vanity -note that the showers had clear glass doors

review.title: Great view! great location!
review.reviewText: I booked 2 rooms, one was a king with water view and the other was interior room with 2 queen.  We stayed just 1 night for  a graduation. Rooms were clean, spacious, beds were very comfortable. The king room was very nice with a view of the marina and to have an outside patio so I could sit with a glass of wine, was a good way to end 7 hours of driving. Also you can watch the planes coming in for San Francisco from the patio. The king room had a Keurig, we didn't use it -but is nice to know you can bring your favorite coffee along.  I liked that there was a small couch to sit on while reading/watching tv.  Both rooms had vanities outside the bathroom, they also had showers with clear glass doors and the toilet is also in there. So a bit awkward if needing toilet while someone is showering. The king had a spacious closet & mini fridge, the queen had a tall narrow armoire-no fridge (maybe upon request?).  The breakfast had make your own waffles, fresh fruit salad, canned slice peaches, cottage cheese, hard boiled eggs, cereals, oatmeal, toast, bagels, muffins, fresh whole fruit (banana, apple, orange), pastries and coffee, milk, tea, juices to drink. We arrived at a great time!..they had just put out fresh baked cookies-Otis Spunkmeyer! We had no issues with either room, front desk was very friendly and helpful. I would say just be aware that the doors are very heavy and automatically close quite quickly and loudly.  Would love to spend more time in the area.
review.positiveRemarks: location, quietness, plenty of parking

review.reviewText: Good breakfast.  Nice park to walk or ride bicycles next door.  Horatio's for dinner was excellent.

review.title: Quaint and lovely
review.reviewText: The rooms were lovely. Very quaint and quiet hotel. Had a nice jacuzzi and heated pool. Within walking distance of restaurants and shops.

review.title: Nice staff, nice location, clean rooms
review.reviewText: I met a lot of people that have been staying in Marina Inn and all of us have the same comments...the hotel is like a home away from home, the view of the marina is very relaxing and calming. The staff is the best...courteous, hospitable, respectful, friendly, nice, and family oriented. I will definitely come back.

review.title: Nice Hotel, great views
review.reviewText: Check in and out was easy. Staff was courteous and polite. When I checked in I was given a marina view room which was awesome to be able to watch the boats and aircraft land. The jet noise was noticeable, however.

review.title: A San Leandro gem!
review.reviewText: Having the Inn's own shuttle to take from Oakland airport, 1.7 miles away, was a real convenience. The room was spacious, especially the bathroom, the largest I've ever seen. Having "Horatios" restaurant just next door was a treat. After a great night's sleep in comfy beds, we enjoyed choosing from the ample free breakfast of waffles with strawberries, cereals, boiled eggs. Being located on the water made the start of our trip a pleasurable experience. They even gave us complimentary huge macadamia nut and double chocolate chip cookies. The reception desk staff was especially accommodating to our request for adjoining rooms with our friends upon our return stay at the end of our vacation. The location of the Inn by the water and marina makes it the perfect choice to relax so we hope that future development of the area doesn't disturb this gem in San Leandro's crown!
review.positiveRemarks: The convenient location to Oakland airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Increase your available shuttle hours past 9:45pm, for those of us who will fly into Oakland airport at 10:22pm!
review.locationRemarks: 1.7 miles from Oakland airport, Shuttle service, "Horatios" next door. Stayed overnight so no time to tour the sights of charming San Leandro, a pity

review.title: Terrible view! Don't stay in room 325!
review.reviewText: Outside of the ridiculous view from the room, we had an excellent time at this facility. Appreciate the shuttle driver in the front desk personnel.

review.title: Much better than rated.
review.reviewText: Delightful experience throughout the whole week!   Hotel staff are exceptional!  Every staff person was friendly, professional, kind, and caring.    My wife and I enjoyed every minute of our stay.
review.positiveRemarks: We were especially pleased with the cleanliness throughout the facility and cannot say enough about the exceptional staff..
review.locationRemarks: Surroundings are very pleasant and access to Interstate routes to San Francisco, Bay Area, Napa, and other area attractions are close by.

review.title: Marina Inn on San Francisco Bay
review.reviewText:
Very Close to airport and got in late.  Leaving early the next morning so it was a quick in and out.
Great breakfast in morning.   Fireplace was nice on a cool evening.
review.positiveRemarks: Room clean, closeness to airport, would like to golf but had no time
review.locationRemarks: Near airport and easy to get to.  Golf course right across street

review.title: A fantastic place to stay!
review.reviewText: I was there for a week and have nothing to say but good things! Facilities and amenities were great but what really made the difference was the staff. Every one that I talked to was genuinely friendly and helpful. They went out of their way to make my stay exceptional. If you are in the area stay here... you will be glad you did!
review.positiveRemarks: One thing that stands out is that they have transportation wherever you need to go within a two mile radius. Awesome.
review.negativeRemarks: I can't think of anything that needs improvement.

review.title: Nice stay
review.reviewText: I've stayed here twice and both stays were nice and the breakfast is pretty good. My favorite rooms have the balconies attached and face the water. The outside is dated and rooms need to be remodeled the bathrooms are very nice I feel the whole room should be as well.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your positive feedback about our hotel. We take pride in catering to our guests' needs the best way we can. I hope you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

review.title: Putting thought into thier service
review.reviewText: Everything about this place had me saying to my husband, "these people have really put some thought into everything they do".  It is not the most luxurious, but it had everything that I needed for a comfortable stay and they splurged on the litttle things, like the toiletries,  which are important to me.
review.locationRemarks: Enjoyed both of the nearby Resturants and the walking around the Marina was delightful.

review.title: Nice Hotel near San Leandro Marina!
review.reviewText:
I stayed at the Marina Inn for a few days last month while I was in town during a business trip. I was looking for something that was near the airport and near Alameda that was quiet and comfortable. Hotel was in a quiet area, but was a short drive away from 880 and Doolittle Drive. It was nice to walk behind hotel along marina and the park and watch the sunset over San Francisco Bay. Hotel was as it appears in pictures and the front desk staff was very friendly. Walked into lobby and first thing I smelled was freshly baked cookies, which is never be a bad thing! Hotel had more of a classic feel than most chain hotels/motels, but everything was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was okay, but could have used a little more protein choices and a little less carb options.

Would definitely stay there again if I'm in town for business in the East Bay area. Next time I would try to find time to try Horatio's which seemed like a happening place the few nights I was at hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Good location, friendly staff, fresh baked cookies
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel had old feel (or charm depending upon perspective); could use some freshening. Breakfast was limited and could use some variety of options.
review.locationRemarks: Nearby to marina, golf courses and parks. Quiet more residential area. Not many places to eat nearby. 10 minutes to airport and 15 minutes to Alameda.

review.title: Nice San Leandro Hotel
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel because of it's location near the Oakland airport.  Having an early morning flight we wanted to stay away from the morning freeway traffic. Quiet location on the San Leandro Marina with a lovely park next door that on a warm afternoon is a great place for a  run or walk.  Nice restaurant next for lunch or dinner.  Hotels breakfast is fine with the usual waffles and cereal and fruit.
review.positiveRemarks: Close enough to the airport without traffic and noise and great park next door.
review.negativeRemarks: More outlets in the rooms.
review.locationRemarks: Park is next door for a nice walk or run along the water.

review.title: Stayed for the park and fly.
review.reviewText: We were greeted by Diamond. She was super and made sure that the kids got their cookies. There were 10 of us. Had a super shuttle driver both ways to and from the airport. Loved it and would totally recommend the Marina Inn.
review.positiveRemarks: The whole stay.
review.negativeRemarks: can't think of anything.
review.locationRemarks: We arrived just before dinner and left for the airport just after breakfast. Close to 2 restaurants and they gave a nice discount for dinner.

review.title: Convenient, clean and hospitable.
review.reviewText: Good location on the bay, quiet and convenient. Rooms are always clean and the staff is friendly. Get 10% off at Horatios on food and drink is helpful and convenient since it is next door.
review.positiveRemarks: Never had any complaints about staying here and I have been coming for 10 years now.
review.negativeRemarks: The hotel books up too frequently and would like it to be more available. Probably should write bad reviews to keep people from coming.

review.title: Nice hotel. Easy to get to.
review.reviewText: Was there for a sports event at the Oakland Colasium. Easy to get to the Bart station.

review.title: Way nicer than 2.5 stars as rated online . . .
review.reviewText: My husband and I hadn't been away together in a long time and we went for an early anniversary gift to ourselves, it was wonderful.  Beautiful hotel and friendly, welcoming staff!  The room was comfortable and clean no complaints here!  Will definitely visit again!

review.title: Nice hotel for traveling in and out of Oakland
review.reviewText: Good location and clean comfortable room. Decent breakfast and safe place to walk.
Pretty good hotel. Staff are friendly, very close to Oakland airport.  Free breakfast is pretty good. I will stay here again.

review.title: Close but no cigar
review.reviewText: Our room was overlooking the parking lot. No water view - not even close. The surrounding neighborhood was scetchy. The staff was nice enough. I did not feel that for the price we paid it was up to snuff. Had the price been cheaper I may have been more thrilled.
review.positiveRemarks: Bed was comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: price
review.locationRemarks: Not great, driving is required to get to anything, but it was very very close to the airport.

review.title: Friendly & quiet
review.reviewText: The staff are possibly the most polite and friendly I've ever come across. Hotel itself was very clean and quiet. Small gym and pool,with a golf course on the other side of the road, and a couple of restaurants in walking distance. If you're looking for lots to do locally then this isn't the place for you, but the chances are you'll have a car -San Francisco is approx 40 min drive away.  Beautiful view across the marina and bay from my window

review.title: Overnight stay prior to early flight to Hawaii
review.reviewText: What a wonderful hotel and the staff are so kind. Hotel shuttle will take and pick you up at the Oakland Airport which is so convenient. Two lovely restaurants next to the hotel. Nice breakfast items in lobby. They even allow you to keep your vehicle here while you travel for a minimal fee. Will definitely use this hotel again.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience, cleanliness, availability of restaurants, comfort.
review.locationRemarks: Right on the water, great view if you happen to get a room that faces that way. Nice pool and hot tub. Two great restaurants next door.

review.title: Surprised !!
review.reviewText: Being that this is our time visiting this hotel, I was very pleased with our stay. I definitely will return when I am in the area. I was able to visit many places and come back to this with a very nice peaceful atmosphere.

review.title: Nice Hotel ride a bike at the Bay for free
review.reviewText: Close to a shore beautiful views of the sail boats, they rent for free the bikes and the ride is for the Bay shore 7.5 miles, there is a nice jacuzzi, I enjoyed a lot (for business but with my wife), lot of fishers, fishing striped bass (2-4 pounds)
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet, nice, ubication (close to the Okland airport and stadium) not to far from San Francisco (30-50 minutes) depending on traffic.
review.negativeRemarks: Well the continental breakfast is quiet good, but could include hot dishes.

review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable bed, bfast included is a plus around 45 mingrom union square and fisherman wharf
This hotel was a gem, from the facilities to the staff
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was the icing on the cake

review.title: Nice hotel in quiet area
review.reviewText: Write next to a marina and bay. Very quiet and very very clean. Slept with balcony door open for fresh breeze something you can't get in other hotels. Not far from San Fran at all. We rented a car and just remember you are in a big city and give yourself enough time to get to places. Everyone was nice there and breakfast was decent but needs more hot options. I would definitely stay there again!
review.positiveRemarks: How clean it was
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast hot options
review.locationRemarks: Go to la piata Mexican restaurant...best Mexican food ever and right down the street from hotel. Also Walmart is five minutes by car.

review.title: Not ideal for SF travel.
review.reviewText: Very far from Sf. Must pay toll to enter SF. Expensive for the location.  Needs to be renovated.  No decent food or shops near the hotel.

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Great view of the bay. Straight shot off of the highway.

review.title: Very nice hotel by the Bay.
review.reviewText: We were playing golf at the two local links courses and this was the perfect place to stay. We had dinner at Horatio's (next door to the hotel) and received a 10% discount because we were staying at this hotel. The hotel has a nice pool and hot tub. Breakfast was included too.
review.positiveRemarks: It's location. It's not too big and the staff are very friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing.
review.locationRemarks: Golf, boating and walks by the shore. Good restaurants nearby.

review.title: Comfortable, clean, and very nice
review.reviewText: We had an excellent experience at this hotel. They are very accommodating and offer a lot of things most hotels don't. What was especially nice is the shuttle to the train station, so if you want to go into any of the cities you don't have to worry about driving. It also picks you up when you get back. The staff were friendly and the hotel was very clean. I would definitely stay again and recommend it to others

The inn was in a good location and with a nice restaurant close.  We stayed there due to the proximity of the airport.  It was quite easy to get to and return.  Room was ok.  Bed was  ok but pillows were hard.  Not very good foam pillows.
review.positiveRemarks: Location and view
review.negativeRemarks: Beds & pillows
review.locationRemarks: I was interested in location by airport. There was not much to see in San Leandro, except the bay.

review.reviewText: We love staying at The Marina Inn when we go the the bay area to visit my brother & his family. Our kids enjoy the pool & we all enjoy the thoughtful & delicious fresh baked cookies & milk @ 5.

review.title: Fantastic hotel, friendly staff
review.reviewText:
We loved this hotel. The room was clean and comfortable, and we found the staff to be the most friendly of all of the 12 hotels that we stayed in during our 3 week trip to the USA. The hotel operates a free shuttle service to the nearest BART station to make it easy to get to San Francisco without having to drive.

The pool was large and warm, and there's also an excellent hot tub.

The Breakfast was OK, but would have been better with some cooked food as well.

Free freshly made cookies and milk at 17:00 was another nice touch.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff, clean and comfortable room, large pool and free taxi service to local BART station.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast would benefit from some cooked food. There's no bath in the room - just a shower.

review.title: Not a good hotel
review.reviewText: The room has strong toilet smell, no restaurant in the hotel. There are only continental breakfast served and no hot food, not at all any meat, seems like hotel only accommodates vegetarians

review.title: GREAT Value on SF Bay
review.reviewText: We stayed twice at this remarkable inn on San Francisco Bay near San Leanardo and the Oakland Int'l airport.  This is a gem on the bay and well worth staying here.  If we had known we would have stayed here instead of in San Fran for MUCH less cost and a MUCH nicer hotel.  The commute to SF over the Bay Bridge is not difficult at all.
review.positiveRemarks: It's location, amenities and excellent/helpful staff.  The breakfast is amazing and many healthy choices.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing at all
review.locationRemarks: There is a nearby walking or bicycling park (the hotel loans you bikes).  San Fran and Fisherman's Wharf is just over the bridge.

review.title: Bad neighborhood
review.reviewText: This is not a bad motel, but the location is absolutely horrible. The neighborhood (or more accurately, the 'hood') should not be recommended to anyone not gang related. It is nowhere near anything a tourist would want.

review.title: Pleasant Stay
review.reviewText: We had a pleasant 5-day stay.  Staff was very helpful; as was the shuttle driver.  Fruit, cookies, and milk in the late afternoons available at the desk were a great plus, as was the free parking.  Negatives were a rather drab room and hallway decor and our room was too small causing us to have to double-up on one of the beds when we all would have preferred our own beds.  (There were 3 adults.)
review.positiveRemarks: Reasonable price and free shuttle to BART station.
review.negativeRemarks: The decor.

review.reviewText: Exceptionally nice staff. Good jumping off point for San Francisco and Sausalito.
review.positiveRemarks: Good staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Room did not have much of a view.

review.title: Older, but nice hotel close to the airport.
review.reviewText: The outside of the hotel looks older, but once you are inside its really nice. Everything was very clean and the staff was very friendly! The breakfast was great as well!

review.title: Nice location to relax
review.reviewText: Although a little far from city,   It was s lovely hotel well run.   Nothing to complain about.   Clean & comfortable.

review.title: Pretty good deal
review.reviewText: Pretty good location.  Easy access to the Bart.  Comfortable rooms

review.title: GREAT HOTEL
review.reviewText: The Marina Inn is a gem on San Francisco Bay. You might not believe that as you drive through Oakland and some of the surrounding neighborhoods but it is truly a first class inn.  ALL of the employees are so friendly and welcoming that you feel like you have come home.  They have homemade cookies in the afternoons, a great complimentary breakfast, bicycles to use to ride in a nearby park, and very clean,comfortable rooms.  It is close to the small quaint town of San Leanardo which in itself is worth seeing. I wish we had known and we would have stayed here instead of SF.  It is convenient to the Oakland airport and freeways and they have shuttle service to/from the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: EVERYTHING. Good location on the bay and near golf and parks.  The staff is extremely good and helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing at all.
review.locationRemarks: A golf course is right across the street and a great park on the bay is within easy walking distance

review.reviewText: Clean and close to airport,oakland A's/Raiders stadium and close to shopping also.

review.title: Good quite location and the facility is nice
review.reviewText: Great stay would recommend to anyone. The breakfast was good, with fresh items and warm hard boiled eggs. The layout of the breakfast eating area was also very good.

review.title: Easy commute for San Franciso
review.reviewText: Spacious hotel with good facilities, perhaps a slightly dated feel but fundamentals absolutely fine. Initial check in was terrible, but due to approach of only one member of staff, all others were friendly, efficient and professional.  Kids enjoyed the free cookies at 5pm! Breakfast area large and light with plenty of choice of fruit, yogurts, cereals and pastries - only boiled eggs, no other cooked foods. Pool area pleasant and really thick, large pool towels available at the front desk. Free, bookable hotel shuttle bus to local train station made commuting into San Francisco fairly easy - about 45 minutes to downtown - and rarely had to wait more then 15 minutes for collection again upon return.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet, good facilities.
review.negativeRemarks: Perhaps some additional cooked breakfast items.
review.locationRemarks: Location quiet, two restaurants within walking distance and a golf course otherwise a drive of 10-15 minutes required to find an evening meal.

review.title: Great value for money
review.reviewText: Stayed in the Marina Inn on a recent rd trip with our last stop being A visit to San Francisco. Although it is not in the city but over the other side of the bay I did not find this a problem. The staff were really friendly and helpful and they ran a complimentary pick up and drop off from the local Bart station to get you over to San Francisco ($8.50 return) you just call them when you want picked up. The hotel was clean and welcoming. There is a heated pool free cookies and milk, free coffee from dining room all day and the included breakfast has a great choice waffles, pastries, cereal, fruit, toast and yogurt. There are 2 restaurants next to hotel where you get a 10% discount for staying in hotel and we ate in both. The parking is free which was great for us as we had a hire car and in San Francisco you are charged anything between $30-50 per day. The rooms are not huge but we were sharing one with 2 older children and for a few days it was fine. The bathroom has a huge shower and you get complimentary bottles of  water in your room. All in all we found this a great place to stay and great value for money and would definitely stay again.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff, the breakfast and the complimentary taxi to the Bart station.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing

review.title: Great find!
review.reviewText: Staff was super accommodating ! Hotel is flanked by a golf course and the bay! Shuttle service to the Bart station, easy commute to San Fran ! Very reasonable definitely would stay here again!
review.positiveRemarks: Location,staff pricing
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Close to Bart bay and bridge easy to get around by car.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the marina
review.reviewText: Nice hotel close to a golf course and a marina. Continental breakfast included

review.title: Great Hotel and even better staff!
review.reviewText: I recently visited San Francisco with my 9 year old son and 2 18 year old nieces. We all enjoyed this hotel.  From the moment we checked in Diamond was so kind and helpful.  We needed advice on getting to San Francisco and she told us how to schedule a shuttle to the BART and back (it stops at 10 pm so you'll have to get a taxi - about $11 - if you're out later), printed a map for us and even suggested some places to visit.  There are cookies and milk out every night and coffee and tea available in the lobby/seating area all day.  There's a business center with 3 computers for adults to use - very easy to log on to and use - as well as another station designated for printing boarding passes.  There are bicycles to ride and a great breakfast every morning.  Our room was clean and roomy enough that the 4 us were not stepping on each other.  The sink is outside of the bathroom so that everyone can get ready at roughly the same time.  There is a big parking lot and a park right next door.  I recommend this hotel to anyone visiting San Francisco.  The rates are well under what you'll pay for a dirty hotel in a shady neighborhood in San Francisco.
review.locationRemarks: Not much to do in the area but it's in a great location as a base to visit the San Francisco area.  There is an outlet mall about 10 minutes away.

review.title: Good

Good Hotels , Good staff,
bed comfortable, nice area and quiet , 
close to the Airport. 
It need some changes like carpet and some other stuff. 
Overall is good.

review.title: good place to stay
review.reviewText: clean room, convenient to Oakland airport, liked it.

review.title: Nice place!
review.reviewText: Nice staff, clean, good location. Continental breakfast was great. Plenty of parking.  I would definitely stay there again!

review.title: We'll be back!
review.reviewText: We picked this hotel simply because it was the closest to our daughter's (small) new home and it was reasonably priced.  We had modest expectations and were just hoping for a clean and quiet place to lay our heads after the baby shower.  What a nice surprise though.  There were many amenities we weren't even aware of (24 hr business center, fitness center, etc.), the staff were very pleasant, the room was sparkling and the breakfast fare was fresh and varied.  This will likely be our go-to hotel when we visit the kids in the bay area.

review.title: Nice older hotel, very well maintained and clean

review.title: Nice hotel on pretty marina

The location is stunning but you have to first pass through a neighbourhood which is not the best, which is a shame. It's about a half hour drive from San Francisco.  The room was clean and very comfortable. The staff were kind and helpful. The only improvement would be guest laundry facilities.

review.title: Right on the bay.
review.reviewText: My wife and I arrived two hours early , rooms were not ready , but still managed to make a few changes and place us in a room. They went out of their way to make sure we had a pleasant stay. Great staff and management. Would return for sure.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff very pleasant , professional.
review.negativeRemarks: Mattress and pillows too firm .
review.locationRemarks: The bay is in the back yard of the hotel, with walks. Great for evening strolls.

review.title: A's Game and Airport
review.reviewText:

Next day shuttle took us to the airport for our flight home.
Check was easy and informative (wish we had known about all of the amenities in advance so we could have planned an earlier arrival)
The breakfast was more than ample. I was satiated all day!
We got a lot of value for our money and deeply appreciate that as many hotels think too highly of themselves and fall far short of delivering the "goods"

we stayed at beginning and end of our trip out of OAK

review.title: Very clean, well-maintained hotel
review.reviewText: Marina Inn was a pleasant surprise.room is clean, had everything we need - hair dryer, clothing iron, microwave & fridge.they give 2 complimentary bottled water per day. We like that they provide Neutrogena soap, shampoo & lotion, esp when you need hypoallergenic stuff for the kids. We love the deluxe continental breakfast. And the staff are very friendly & courteous! My 4-yr-old daughter left her plush toy in the room and only realized it 4 hrs after we checked out. I was dreading the housekeeper might have thrown it away or claim they haven't seen it but to my surprise, i called the front desk & said they have it there already! What nice staff! That toy meant the world to my daughter & was overjoyed that they found it. Will definitely recommend this hotel to friends & family!

review.title: Nice and clean!
review.reviewText: Marina Inn was such a wonderful place from the location and the first class service.  Staff all seemed so happy it was great to see.  Room was set up nice and very clean.  I would recommend this place hands down!
review.positiveRemarks: Location and cleaniness
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing

review.title: Great quite hotel

short stay but was satisfied, breakfast was excellent

review.reviewText: Hotel staff was great and attentive especially Mary Lou, Jesus and Matt. Older hotel that was a little dated but adequate. Bed very comfortable. Loved the freshly baked cookies and milk before bed. Heard airplanes from time to time landing at the Oakland Airport but not too bad

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Stay there for work once every other month. Great staff, affordable up to date clean rooms with everything you need. Great restaurant(s) next door with discounts for room key. Horatios is amazing.

review.title: Great hotel at the marina
review.reviewText: We stayed here for 5 nights using it as a base to go into the city (free shuttle from the hotel to the San Leandro BART station 10 mins away) We also drove to Yosemite and Muirs woods. Very reasonably priced, we had a junior suite on the 2nd foor. Substantial continental breakfast included in the tariff and Horatio's restuarant within 2 mins walk. Also FREE parking! The hotel is a little dated but clean and tidy with reasonable appointments.
review.positiveRemarks: As above.

review.title: Great hotel on the marina. Liked the location.
review.reviewText: Our son, who lives nearby, recommended this hotel to us and it was a great choice.  Friendly & helpful staff, comfortable & clean rooms, good breakfast included every morning.  My husband & I enjoyed getting some exercise on the walking/running/biking path every day.  There are 2 excellent restaurants within walking distance and a golf course across the street.  The hotel provides shuttle service to the BART station, so travel into the city was convenient.  We will definitely stay at The Marina Inn on our next visit to the Bay area.

review.locationRemarks: Convenient location with city transportation close by.  Shopping, golfing, a quiet park and walking area right outside the hotel.

review.title: Really enjoyed my stay
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel, close to Oakland Airport, and two local golf courses (literally across the street).  The shuttle service was impeccable, the staff awesome, and the area was very pleasant.  I will be staying here again!
It was quiet and would recommend to couples. It is close enough to San Fransico but far away from the hustle of the big city.

review.title: Beautiful view of the bay!

review.title: Excellent shuttle service!
review.reviewText: First time in San Leandro.  Went for family trip. Extremely accommodating. Excellent shuttle service.  Employees super friendly.  Great food in the breakfast area. Free computer and printer for boarding passes.  I'm telling you.. best experience ever at a hotel to get 100%. Not one thing wrong.  Even had nice soap and shampoo and conditioner. Lol.

review.title: Suprising find in San Leandro!
review.reviewText: Enjoyed my 3-night mid-week stay very much.  I had a lovely view of the Marina, and enjoyed listening to the water and the seagulls at night.  There are walking paths along the water.  The staff was friendly, attentive, and professional.  My only suggestion would be to provide a list of restaurants nearby that deliver in each room.  Room service is only available 5-9pm from the restaurant next door, and although the food was delicious, the menu is limited.  But that's a very small complaint in an otherwise great stay!
review.positiveRemarks: Free wireless internet, nice continental breakfast, view, comfortable bed, soda in vending machine was cheap, friendly staff.

The free breakfast was fabulous, make your own waffle. Great restaurant next door with 10% coupon from the hotel.

The free continental breakfast was more than I expected, the complimentary shuttle runs 6am-10pm, and they give out milk and cookies after 5pm. Every time we passed an employee they said hello, some even asked how our stay was going. The only downfall is there is nothing near the hotel to see. We walked about 2 miles to a shopping plaza for some food. Great experience.

review.title: We would stay again

If you would rather ride around the trails, the hotel has bicycles for guests to use.  Our room had a balcony with great views across the bay and every afternoon the staff baked cookies for the guests... that was an unexpected treat.  We would definately stay at the Marina Inn again.

review.title: Very happy
review.reviewText: This hotel was very clean, comfortable and well equipped. The breakfast was good with it being restocked constantly. The complimentary shuttle bus to the nearby BART station is a great service. The staff were all friendly too. We had no issues whatsoever. Also an easy drive into San Francisco City.

review.title: 26th Wedding Anniversary
review.reviewText:
This was our 26th Wedding Anniversary. 
The hotel staff was excellent and the room was very clean. However, it is time for an update. Love the bay. Enjoyed watching the planes take off/land. Bike ride was nice. Enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, but meat needs to be added to the menu. Larger tables are needed in the eating area. Also, move the ice machine to a isolated area. Would not want a room with bay view because the boats blocked the view.  The neighboring restaurants were terrible and should not be recommended.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel staff and how well the hotel has been maintained.
review.negativeRemarks: Update the rooms. Add meat to the complimentary breakfast and larger tables in the eating area. Move the ice machine to a isolated area.
review.locationRemarks: Love the bay. Enjoyed watching the planes take off/land. Bike ride was nice. The neighboring restaurants were terrible and should not be recommended.

review.title: Quiet and quaint

Our stay was very short but service and room were very good

review.title: Nice hotel with free shuttlebus
review.reviewText: We found the staff to be friendly and helpful and the rooms were very good too.  The only letdown was the breakfast which was very basic.

review.title: Nice, comfortable hotel to stay in when traveling
review.reviewText: We spent one night at the marina inn before flying home out of the oakland airport. It was so nice that we regretted not staying another night! We walked around the marina then had a great dinner at Alfonso's right next to the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: We liked the ambiance, the room, the staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing could be improved that we can think of
