review.title: Nice hotel free shuttle service to the Bart
review.reviewText: My husband and i had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel.The staff are really helpful and friendly.We used the bart every day to travel into San Francisco and after the crowds and busy streets it was a pleasure to come home to the peaceful and safe Marina Inn. We enjoyed the free cookies and milk on arrival every evening.
review.positiveRemarks: The beds are very comfortable and the rooms are very clean.The staff are very friendly.There are free apples on the reception.Peaceful location.
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe some ham with the breakfast buffet.
review.locationRemarks: .The Marina is beautiful and there are lovely walks and a free bike is available to explore,there is a golf course just opposite the hotel,

review.title: Marina Inn - San Leandro
review.reviewText: This was a business trip for a training I was doing in San Francisco but there were no rooms to be had in SF (60,000 Oracle people in town). I decided to stay outside the city and take BART. Choosing the Marina Inn was a great decision. What a great hotel! The staff was friendly and helpful. They greeted me when I walked through the door. The hotel was clean and neat. They asked about my dinner plans and directed me to the restaurant next door (Horatio's) where I got a 10% discount on a fabulous meal. The room itself was clean, had wireless internet access, a flat screen TV, a great shower (tons of water pressure) and was clean (even by my mother's standards!). They even put cookies and milk out at 5:30. We even had a view of the bay and marina (could sort of see SF in the distance through the haze) and a small balcony with chairs. We loved it and would definite stay there again rather than drive into SF.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the friendly staff, the cleanliness of the hotel, the grounds and the room.
review.negativeRemarks: Can't think of anything.
review.locationRemarks: The BART station was very close, probably a 10-minute drive. Was there on business but enjoyed the marina view.

review.title: Comfortable Rooms with beautiful view
review.reviewText: We only stayed one night. Too bad there isn't an easy way from this hotel to San Francisco for a tourist or I would recommend this over the hotels there. Cozy, and comfortable. We were leaving early for the airport the front desk arranged for our cab and sent up a continental breakfast! Would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: The view of the bay

review.title: Great Location on San Francisco Bay
review.reviewText: This is a great place.  I booked The Marina Inn on San Francisco Bay because I needed a place to stay near Oakland Airport, the reviews were great, and the price was right.  Rooms are clean and comfortable with all the amenities of popular chain hotels.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Discounts to nearby restaurants at available and the free breakfast is excellent.  I had a room with a marina/bay view, which was very relaxing after a few days in San Francisco.  I could also see the planes arriving and landing at the airport.  When I opened my balcony door I was greeted by the sounds of seagulls and geese, which I really enjoyed.  I highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay ere again. It was a great stay.

review.title: A hidden gem...
review.reviewText: This place was fabulous. They are the next best thing to "all inclusive". They offer small tokens of gesture which makes you as the customer/guest feel appreciated- the two "free" water bottles in the room per day, the fridge and micro included, the milk and warm cookies daily at 5pm, the friendly smile each time you see staff.  I was VERY pleasantly surprised and grateful for the small things. The views of the boats, water are so peaceful and just an outstanding place to relax; and free bike check out to enjoy a mellow stroll around the bay on two separate courses. Its unbelievable the message they send that the customer really does matter. They also include clean and new transportation to and from the airport, and to the BART to head to Frisco. The lobby is inviting, the free breakfast was plentiful and fresh. The all day coffee bar is awesome when you need a pick me up! Even the restaurant next door was worth the visit and the hotel guests get 10% off...helpful as it is a little bit pricy. I cant say enough good things about this place.  We will definitely return to this hotel on any future visits to the area.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything...as noted above. all the extra "bells and whistles" are a TRUE bonus! :-)
review.negativeRemarks: If I could have thnig more...it would be meat with the breakfast - ham, bacon, etc.  Even it had to be purchased. ummm!!!  :0)
review.locationRemarks: The location was great, especially by the water.

review.title: Great base to explore san fransico
review.reviewText: Lovely peaceful location on the marina, if you dont fancy the 15mins drive to the bart to get to san fransico the hotel provides a shuttle,  great touch. Breakfast spot on,more then satisfactory great choice, great coffee. Only thing i can fault is the plug socket s in the room, i could only get the extension under the desk to work, im sure if i had told them about the problem it would have been resolved.  Happy staff. Great stay.would come again.

review.title: Excellent on a budget option
review.reviewText: If you are going to San Francisco adjacent areas, this is an excellent option. Is clean, has a great staff and even though I do not like a lot the general area where the hotel is located, the specific area, the bay where is located, is very nice and feels secure. I will gladly recommend this hotel, specially for their great personal.

review.title: Great hotel and staff
review.reviewText:
My room was facing the harbor on the second floor,  great view of boats and sometimes San Francisco.  The hotel is close to the airport, restaurants, and a mall.  Airport is near too, some but very little noise from planes which was nice as compared to other hotels I have stayed at.

I visited many places during my stay,  SF,  Napa, etc.  There is a BART station that has trains to SF very close too but I did not take advantage of it.  The hotel provides a free shuttle to the BART station too.
review.positiveRemarks: This hotel is a model for what other hotels should be.  Great staff, clean rooms, free parking and a very nice free breakfast,  even home baked cookie
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing that I can think of

review.title: Great peaceful Stay
review.reviewText: I loved the balcony and how cozy the room is. The staff is friendly and welcoming.
review.positiveRemarks: The atmosphere, you can view the waterfront from your room.
review.negativeRemarks: Not at all ...

review.title: One night of hotel bliss
review.reviewText: We usually prefer renting an apartment or staying in a B&B, but for an early flight the next day, staying in a hotel near the airport is just the ticket. Overall, our one night stay was great from the moment we set foot in the door to when we left via the hotel's airport shuttle.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was super friendly and accommodating. Our room and all public areas were clean, fresh and gleaming. Hairdryer, shampoo and such were furnished.
review.negativeRemarks: Air conditioning was not on in room and we didn't know how to use it.
review.locationRemarks: Horatio's was steps from hotel. We went for a lovely after-dinner stroll around the marina and it was just a short ride to the Oakland Airport.

review.title: Nice hotel outside of San Francisco
review.reviewText:
We were looking for a hotel with a more affordable price for our trip to San Francisco.  This hotel is about a half hour drive from the city. (I did wish it were much closer, but this wasn't a huge issue as we rented a car).  The gentleman at the front desk who greeted us upon check-in was super pleasant and informative.  They serve a continental breakfast (including waffles) daily, and had bicycles for us to borrow for the day at no extra charge (that was a nice touch).  Although we did not get a chance to take advantage of it, there is also a restaurant right next door that offers discounts to hotel guests.  We happened to be staying there during the most recent earthquake and the structure had no resulting issues that I was aware of. 
Overall, a decent stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice lobby, breakfast available, large shower space, hot water was readily available at all times (have had issues with this at other hotels before).
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom sink's counter space was very small.
review.locationRemarks: There's a nice park and pathways nearby around the marina.  Great views across the bay, and you can watch planes take off and land at the airport

review.title: Great hotel, nice location
review.reviewText: Pleasant welcome to this hotel for us as overseas visitors.  Facilities all clean and tidy.  Nice pool area.  Rooms are good, coffee machine was useful.  Bed was comfy.  Light and airy breakfast area and good array of breakfast items.  Hotel is in a good location for strolling around the marina.  Only two slightly negative comments - a more thorough introduction to the site would have been useful - we had to ask where to park and how to get to our room, and weren't told where the pool was (there are signs, it's not hard to find).  And although we'd heard about the cookies and milk in the lobby, there was no sign of them on the couple of times we were passing through the lobby in the evenings, and nor were we told about them on arrival.  So not sure if they're still doing this or if it's just for the 'in' crowd that know where to find them!  If you're particularly keen on the cookies perhaps it pays to ask!

review.title: Nice hotel near San Francisco
review.reviewText: The hotel has a very good location to visit San Francisco and Napa Valley.  The hotel is a little old but it is kept in good condition. Free parking is a good plus, as well as the free breakfast and free internet. the staff is courteous and friendly. A plus locations with good options for eating nearby.  I would definitely recommended.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, friendly and courteous staff.

review.title: great hotel
review.reviewText: we loved staying here and would highly recommend it
review.positiveRemarks: clean, modern and close to the water, quiet and restful
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: get the free shuttle to the outlet mall, to the bart and enjoy San Fran

review.title: Pleasant Stay, in nice location
review.reviewText: Stayed a total of three nights. Very nice hotel, located in a nice part of San Leandro looking out over the marina towards the bay. Easy check in and check out. Very good complimentary breakfast
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast, shuttle, clean and tidy rooms, quiet location
review.negativeRemarks: Shuttle going from hotel to BART station no problem, but harder to get back, as often you have to wait if people are booked to come from hotel
review.locationRemarks: Nice walk around the marina, the restaurant across the carpark has very nice food, and a nice view. Spent most of my time in San Francisco itself

review.title: Best of the area
review.reviewText:
Everything from check in to departure was wonderful . Staff so helpful, courteous. Location is awesome. Quick shuttle to the BART and into everywhere you go. 
Truly wish we had more time. Great place to relax! Tom C.  Tim thank you for your help, suggestions and for making us feel at home.
Breakfast is very nice, a meat option is the only suggestion. Did I say how nice everyone is? The gentleman who picked us up from BART on 8/4 at 7pm ( loved Berk but the ducks are winning!)

review.title: This was a great find for us so close to OAK.
review.reviewText: The Marina Inn is like a breath of fresh air. Everyone who works there acts like they are glad you are staying there. Fresh flowers in all of the public spaces is certainly a departure from franchise hotels. We will always try to book here first when we are flying in and out of OAK.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff.

review.title: Came highly recommended by friends and family...
review.reviewText: I live in the Sacramento area and was attending an 80th bday party...not knowing the area, expedia assisted in my search for a place to stay....after I let others aware of my choice of hotel...everyone's comment was that the marina was a definite first choice site....it was a pleasant experience in every way

review.title: Nice and clean rooms
review.reviewText: Good experience my kids liked it and the continental breakfast was very good you get to make your own waffle which my kids loved
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the freeways
review.negativeRemarks: Mattress a little to hard

review.title: Good facility, great staff!
review.reviewText: We stayed at the Marina Inn weary from a long international flight. All of the staff that we met at the Marina Inn were warm, helpful, and a pleasure to deal with.  The attitude here really is exceptional.  The room was clean, fresh, and quiet.  A great place to stay, in a pleasant area with nice views, and right next to some wonderful walking trails on the bay.

review.title: inn with a marina view
review.reviewText: great location.  good restaurants are walking distance. The hotel is right next to the marina. staff is excellent.  Breakfast is very good. room is clean and comfortable. I enjoyed my morning walk in the marina.
review.positiveRemarks: location. free shuttle to the airport and Bart stations and shopping areas.
review.locationRemarks: It's right next to the marina. Airport is nearby and ferries going to San Francisco fisherman's wharf. Shuttle bus can take you to the Bart station.

review.title: Friendly helpful staff.
review.reviewText: I would highly recommend  The Marina  Inn.  The hotel was we'll let and very clean .  The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.

review.title: Nice hotel on the bay, close to San Francisco
review.reviewText: The hotel is quiet, clean and very nice.The entire staff was extremely friendly and concerned about our comfort. Our room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. Our room had a balcony that looked out over the marina. It was really beautiful! They provide free transport to and from the BART station which makes it easy to go into San Francisco if you didn't want to drive in. The free breakfast was really great! It included waffles, fresh fruit and a lot of other great choices. They also offer room service from the restaurant next door to the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks:
Free transportation to and from the BART station. Close to San Francisco.
Free parking.
Free breakfast.
Room service available.
review.locationRemarks:
It was easy to take BART, or drive, into San Francisco.
Close (about an hour drive) to Sonoma. 
It was about a 90 minute drive to Monterey.

review.title: Airport stop over
review.reviewText: We just needed a stop over before catching our flight out of San Fran next day and boy did we find a lovely hotel.this place was delightful. We turned up way early and the desk staff checked to see if one of our rooms was ready and because it was we were allowed to check in and go straight upstairs ,a real bonus.the lobby was well presented and staff were all so helpful and welcoming. Room was just as expected with a balcony over looking the marina,another bonus. Went for a long walk along the bayside over looking San Fran the other side. Free milk and cookies at 5pm in the lobby. Breakfast was ample and good quality. Overall a very impressive stopover and us all rested for the next day. Also didn't need to check out till noon,very helpful for us.
review.positiveRemarks: Absolutely everything,couldn't find fault. Also a really handy computer and printer designated for printing off your plane tickets for next day,
review.negativeRemarks: Can't think of anything.
review.locationRemarks: Positioned right on the bay with a lovely park and golf courses next door. Great location.

review.title: Nice clean room
review.reviewText:
Was surprise how the room was set up
Expected to b runned down but was pleasantly surprised and really enjoy the room staff and view

Tub was the only let down as it slowly drained while taling a shower

Other than that we will b back

review.title: Staff
review.reviewText: Courteous, knowledgeable helpful staff. The shuttle bus was helpful as we were able to get to and from the bart station as we were on foot which was a great help. The Inn supplied water bottles as it was hot. Questions answered always with a smile. Breakfast fantastic and definite plus. Thank you to all.
review.positiveRemarks: on the waters edge great walking are, handy to wonderful restaurants, the staff were fantastic and the pool beautiful for a nice dip.
review.negativeRemarks: To encourage people to take the BART when coming fro the San Francisco International airport. If you fly into Oakland airport they will pick up though
review.locationRemarks: beautiful walks with a nice water great restaurants handy close to BART to be in like a flash to San Fran fisherman's warf. No hussel or bussel relax

review.reviewText: Staff very friendly and helpful.  Shuttle to nearby BART station and airport.  Beautiful location.  Fresh flowers in the lobby and by elevators.  Complimentary water.
review.positiveRemarks: See above
review.locationRemarks: See above

review.title: Not that bad
review.reviewText: It was not as close to the airport as Expedia made it out to be but was ok in the end. The staff was nice and the room was clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice view of the marina.
review.negativeRemarks: It seemed cheap but it was clean.
review.locationRemarks: Business and flying from Oakland.

review.title: Very nice location, right on the Marina
review.reviewText: Hotel staff was excellent, spent a night their with my family, kids loved the heated pool. Snacks in the evening were a hit with my kids and breakfast was on point, I would definitely visit again.

review.title: Very good value for the price
review.reviewText: I took my relatives for a road trip from Orange County and we are very pleased that we picked hotel instead our usual hotel near SFO. Hotel in a quiet area not far from Oakland airport. Very good value for the price. Hotel staff very nice and the room is very clean. Can't expect more for the price.

review.title: Nice hotel near the water
review.reviewText: I would recommend this hotel. The staff was very helpful and the facility was clean and immaculate.

review.title: Wonderful stay!
review.reviewText: We had a great stay here - clean, comfortable rooms, delicious & huge breakfast, and beautiful location on the waterfront next to a park!

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: Great experience. Friendly staff, good breakfast (would be perfect if bacon was available). Comfortable rooms with a nice view of the pier.
review.positiveRemarks: No complaints overall.
review.negativeRemarks: Hi Def TV and 4g receivers.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco

review.title: Not enough time to really enjoy
review.reviewText: Upon a late arrival, the staff were incredibly pleasant and helpful and offerred many different things. This included arranging bicycles or golf the next day (which we didn't have time for) and getting us cookies/apples. The room was arranged a little differently with a wall facing us upon entry but it felt like it added to privacy. The hotel was incredibly clean. The one drawback was difficulty getting the wifi signal in our room.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, comfortable, and a great staff who was very helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Greater wi-fi access

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: Was nice and quiet, very responsive staff. Very accomodatin on check in and flexible especially since I had a late arrival due to weather.
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to bay and my meeting location
review.negativeRemarks: The mattress was not bad, but I prefer a better one than was provided. Am rather particular in that area and not indicative of the normal guest
review.locationRemarks: Particularly like that you can walk over to the bayshore in minutes

review.title: Relaxation
review.reviewText:
Stayed here for 3 nights with my 2 children for a mini getaway in January. Our time there was fabulous! Check-in was a breeze, pleasant gentleman provided me with some great maps and information for things to do in the area.
Our room was perfect (would have loved one with view of the bay).
Breakfast choices exceeded our expectations. Made good use of bikes for great bike ride along the scenic bay. Enjoyed the complementary news paper and 5 o'clock cookies in lobby.
Plan on returning on my next vacation! Highly recommend this place!
review.positiveRemarks: I enjoyed most everything about this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe I am an unseasoned vacationer or haven't had too many hotel stay experiences...but I have no improvement requests. Everything is good.
review.locationRemarks: Cute park right next door had great view and trails for bike rides along right side of bay. Easy freeway and Bart access for S.F. sightseeing.

review.positiveRemarks: friendly staff convenience to 2 nice restaurants

review.title: Great hospitality!
review.reviewText: Coming from la, the staff was super helpful with helping us use public transportation. They also Made you feel like home, beautiful view also. Walls are thin though.overall great stay. Highly recommend.

review.title: Waterfront Accomodations
review.reviewText: I stayed just one night. The staff is awesome! The accomodations are great. The hotel is old but has been upgraded well throughout... although the and surrounding area and harbor seemed a bit run down/depressed. A next-door fine dining restaurant and nearby El Torrito (where I ate!) complement the hotel's remote location on the waterfront.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff and upgrades
review.negativeRemarks: Dual-paned windows would help muffle the sounds of air traffic into/out of nearby Oakland.
review.locationRemarks: There is a large park with jogging/walking loop nearby as well as a couple of good restaurants.

review.title: Diamond in the ruff! Great Get Away!
review.reviewText:
Great location!
Great Staff!
Great Comps - Breakfast - Do it yourself Waffles/Cookies & Milk at night!/Free Bike rentals
Great Room with Balcony and View of Marina and Pool!
Golf Course across the street - discounted fees!
Shuttle to BART - Especially for Raider game!
review.positiveRemarks: Everything was great! Rooms where cleaner than some larger Hotels in the area!
review.negativeRemarks: More advertising!
review.locationRemarks: Bikes, Boating, Golf, Walking, Radiers, Warriors, A's. Great road trip hotel!

review.title: Very nice hotel
review.reviewText: Very good alternative if San Francisco is booked out. Also very close to Oakland. Very friendly staff

review.title: Loved it!
review.reviewText: The staff was very friendly and helpful! They have shuttle Service and this was super convenient for us! The location is great! Its very calm and the view is beautiful.

review.title: Nice clean hotel.
review.reviewText: I was impressed when I walked in to register, at the cleanliness of the hotel and the friendly employees. Our room was spacious and very clean. I loved being right on the water even though we didn't have time to enjoy it as our schedule was very busy. The morning breakfast consisted of a nice variety and adequate. I would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness, friendly employees.

review.title: Don't let the word "INN" fool you! Wonderful place
review.reviewText: Don't be fooled by the word "Inn" in the name of the hotel. Everything anyone has said positive about the hotel is true. It was a wonderful stay and extremely nice for the price, area and closeness to the airport. The shuttle ran fast and on time, the staff (especially Daniel) was very friendly. Free bike rentals that take you around the marina with beautiful views around the water. Discounts at the restaurants within a short walking distance to the hotel. It's right on the waters edge. It's clean, neat and has a great breakfast, some hot foods, lots of fresh cut fruit, cereal, etc. and the business center is perfect for printing boarding passes, etc. Hot cookies at 5 and a happy hour tops everything off. Don't hesitate to stay here. Well worth the money. We usually stay in 4 star hotels and I was a bit reluctant to stay here, however our family of 4 enjoyed it greatly. The fireplace in the lobby with hot tea and coffee all day long proved to be a nice place to sit around and talk with friends from the area that came over to visit.
review.positiveRemarks: Charm, clean rooms and friendly staff
review.negativeRemarks: Had to leave after one night
review.locationRemarks: Perfect spot on the water and close to airport
review.userLocation: Live on the Big Island of Hawaii

review.title: Convenient
review.reviewText: Location was very good and there is a great restaurant and bar about 25 yards away in the same parking lot.

review.title: san leando mariner inn
review.reviewText: Nice place when you need to be in this area, but the lane noise is present all night. So if light sleep er not the place. Beautiful location
review.positiveRemarks: Location
review.negativeRemarks: Airport noise
review.locationRemarks: Excellent

review.title: Great staff and location
review.reviewText: The staff was very professional and made the stay a pleasure. The hotel is conveniently located near the Oakland airport and Oalland coliseum, nice heated pool and hot tub and clean rooms. Would definitely stay there again!
review.positiveRemarks: Hot tub and close to the airport

review.title: Nice hotel at a good rate.
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel on the basis of the ratings in the last six months, which were uniformly high. I found those ratings to be accurate and I wouldn't hesitate to return to this hotel.

review.title: Good value and great location
review.reviewText: Conveniently located 3 miles south of the Oakland Airport. Offers 12-20% discounts on 3 nearby restaurants. Breakfast buffet included in price. Ask for a room facing away from the parking lot which can be noisy in the morning, especially early Monday when the trash is picked up. Has a heated pool and work out room. Freshly baked cookies and milk are a free treat in the afternoon. Good for small business meetings with separate conference rooms. Free shutlel to the airport and other shopping venues in San Leandro within 3-4 miles of hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff and clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Room service on the weekends is often later in the afternoon
review.locationRemarks: Located within easy driving distance of some good places to eat in San Leandro

review.title: Great place
review.reviewText: I plan on staying at this hotel again when I'm in the area. What I really apprecated were the apples when I came in late at night. It gave me the nutrition to have a good night's sleep.
review.positiveRemarks: Great place
review.negativeRemarks: It is sort of out of the way. The cab driver got lost on the way.
review.locationRemarks: See above

review.title: Great hotel period!!!!
review.reviewText: Best service people ever.. Like family! We went to SF by Bart .. They provide shuttle to and from Bart.... They saved us cookies from the 6pm cookies... Like they knew us like family!!! Rooms clean and pool and hot tub imaculant!!! Sunset view to die for!!!

review.title: Quiet peaceful, clean getaway!
review.reviewText: We love the Marina Inn. We stay there regularly. The rooms are clean, we had an awesome view, it was extremely quiet and peaceful. The staff are exceptional. We would recommend this hotel to anyone. Thanks again MI for a wonderful, peaceful trip!
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness, The Bed, and The Staff
review.negativeRemarks: Can't think of anything we did not like about the MI
review.locationRemarks: On the marina, walking distance to parks and close to the airport

review.title: Loved it!!
review.reviewText: Mother/Daughter spent 2 wonderful nights here at the beginning of their 7 day CA Vacay and loved it the BEST! The hotel was so cozy, warm and inviting! The staff could NOT have been any nicer! Katie checked us in and made us feel right at home!! We had a Marina view room, which was awesome! The beds were very comfy and the breakfast here was good, something for everyone! We ate supper at the restaurant next door and it was excellent but pricey. Beware of the Bay Bridge to San Fran in the mornings, traffic is crazy, cost is $4 to cross so bring cash. The overall hotel value and experience cannot be beat! We will definitely stay here again on our next SF trip!!
review.positiveRemarks: The staff, the room, location and the coziness of it all!
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing!
review.locationRemarks: Great jumping off point to many places! 1-hour drive to Santa Cruz and 45 min to 1-hour to downtown San Fran/Fisherman's Wharf (depending on traffic)

review.title: beautiful stay
review.reviewText:
great staff, clean rooms, and great location! (and safe)

did wake up with a backache, but not sure if it was the bed, or lugging my grandkids around. the grounds were well maintained with beautiful plants/flowers. lots of activities within walking distance.
review.positiveRemarks: the friendliness of the staff
review.negativeRemarks: the beds, i felt were not as comfortable as other hotels we have stayed at.

review.title: Nice hotel!
review.reviewText: Nice, upscale hotel, set away from the others that are closer to the stadium.
review.positiveRemarks: By the waterfront, free bikes to explore! Free parking and nice breakfast bar.

review.title: Convenient Oakland Airport hotel...excellent value
review.reviewText: Very good hotel for the money, especially if you are flying out of the Oakland airport on an early morning flight as we were. Very good free breakfast as well. The staff was very friendly and helpful. This hotel was an unexpected surprise of the good kind.
review.positiveRemarks: location, cleanliness, helpfulness of staff
review.negativeRemarks: the A/C unit put out a stale odor.
review.locationRemarks: On the marina and close to the Oakland airport. Probably not much of a reason to stay there unless you are using the airport.

review.title: Quiet get-away
review.reviewText: It's quiet and off the beaten path. The staff are very courteous and caring.

review.title: Marina Inn Freebies
review.reviewText: The Marina Inn has a tasty, free multiple choice breakfast, free on-site bicycles to use at the next door park and marina, and free cookies in the afternoon.

review.title: Impressed with Standard King room.
review.reviewText: The room was quiet, comfortable, nicely decorated, well-appointed. We had a standard King room overlooking the pool, jacuzzi, and docks. Large modern shower. King size bed was super comfy. Mini fridge. Big wall-mounted LCD tv. Spacious with sitting area, armoir, dresser and desk. Bathroom sink/vanity was separate from shower & toilet. GPS took us on a lot of turns down side streets to get there, so we felt a little lost, but it took just 5 minutes to get to the rental car return in the morning before the flight.
review.positiveRemarks: Room was large, quiet and comfortable!

review.title: Marina Inn
review.reviewText: Everything was great. The staff answer all my questions promptly and was very courteous. I would have no problem stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Continential Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Great location for eating. Also very close to the freeway and airport.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, good price, free bicycles and nearby bike trail are an awesome bonus.

review.title: You'll want to visit the Marina Inn
review.reviewText: Marina Inn's location, right on the water, is a treat in nice weather. Very near the airport, yet surprisingly, very quiet. The staff is exemplary, always polite and pleasant and helpful. One nice touch for air travelers is the computer with printer for boarding passes right in the lobby area. An excellent breakfast is included. So do not let the "old" look of the halls turn you from this gem of an inn.

review.title: gem
review.reviewText:
Friendly staff, comfortable room and bed, very clean. Great amenities.
Loved our stay.
review.locationRemarks: Very nice, serene location by the bay

review.title: The Marina Inn
review.reviewText: When we walked in, the lobby smelled like fresh baked cookies, and we were told that there would be cookies available at 5:00 p.m.- and they were!!! The fireplace in the lobby gave it a warm and homey feel. Our room faced the Marina and we had a small patio with table and chairs so we could sit outside and enjoy the view and the glorious sunset. Our room was comfortable and cozy with a nice comforable bed. The continental breakfast in the morning offered so many choices, that anyone could be accomidated. We are looking forward to our next visit.

review.title: Relaxing and wonderful. The water view was beautiful
review.reviewText: Great experience. The warm cookies and milk after 5pm. is wonderful. The friendly staff was always gracious and helpful. My request to change my room to another floor was handled with sincere kindness.

review.title: We'd stay here again.
review.reviewText: Beautiful view, easily accessible, opposite golf course, very friendly and helpful staff. No extra charges as everything complimentary including use of bicycles and local shuttle service.

review.title: Excellent hotel, extremely helpful staff.
review.reviewText: Stayed here for 2 weeks. Staff was very helpful. Cookies and milk starting at 5pm everynight. Highly recommend staying here if you are looking at this area. The pool/hot tub was a good treat after work.

review.title: A diamond in the rough
review.reviewText: I had to think long and hard to find even a tiny detail that was negative. Although an older hotel, the condition and cleanliness was top-notch, just as if it had been remodeled within the year. Service was excellent, efficient, and always sincere and pleasant. Note: sincere. The location was nice, quiet, and away from any major freeways. My room even had a nice view of the sunset overlooking the San Leandro Marina. Horatio's, the adjacent eatery, provides their room service; however, if a full bar is what you desire, make the short walk across the parking lot. It's all well worth it! Lastly, the price could not be beat as compared to comparable chain hotels in proxmity. (Oh, that tiny detail I found annoying? The size of the sink/vanity area was cramped -- as you would normally find in an older hotel.)

review.title: Lovely location, good service, good value
review.reviewText: Although it seemed a little stuck in the 1980s, the hotel was clean and comfortable. The staff was very nice. The location right next to a marina, park and golf course was terrific. Their shuttle delivered me right to my business meeting the next morning. I would stay there again, for sure.

review.title: Gem in San Leandro
review.reviewText:
San Leandro Marina Inn is a gem for anyone wanting to be in the East Bay. Excellent service and price. Not super well located in terms of public transportation, but the shuttle to BART and area amenities takes care of much of this.

San Leandro is centrally located to much of the Bay Area, and would make a good home base for anyone traveling on business to SF, San Jose, and points east. 15 minutes to Oakland Airport, less than an hour to SFO and San Jose airports. For vacationers, it's quiet, has free parking and transportation, and a nice view of the bay outside. Only a couple of bland restaurants at the marina, but a park with spectacular views.

Rooms were just fine, not fancy. Did have a microwave and fridge. But only a shower, so maybe not best for tots. Quiet, decent mattress, clean. What more do you need for this price?

I stayed there for business, while my hubby tagged along. He was able to get the shuttle to public transportation while I was able to zip out to 880 for meetings around the bay. Breakfast is above average for this level of hotel, with actual fresh fruit, waffles, boiled eggs and the usual pastry, bagels, etc.
The staff was very, very nice.

review.title: Great stay in Oakland area.
review.reviewText: We enjoyed staying at the Marina Inn in San Leandro. The motel is a little older and some of the rooms have been remodeled. We stayed in a Bay view room and it was very comfortable with a beautiful view of the marina. I would recommend it to anyone who will be staying in the area.

review.title: Good place to stay if you have to go to Oakland, or surrounding areas.
review.reviewText: Compared to the ratings that other hotels in the nearby area had, this hotel was extremely satisfying. The bed was o.k., but everything else was great.

review.title: A Good Stay
review.reviewText: Agreat hotel!

review.title: Marina Inn was great
review.reviewText: The person at the front desk was helpful and courtious,we were met with a smile and warm chocolate chip cookies. The room was clean and well maintained. When we arrived I noticed that they had a AAA discount that I was not aware of, when I mentioned that I didnt realize they had this discount they upgraded us to a marina view room for the same price as a standard room. When we left we were given breakfast and coffee, we throughly enjoyed our stay and will return for another vist soon.

review.title: Like Coming Home
review.reviewText:
The San Leandro Marina Inn is my favorite place to stay in the area as I travel on business, for my needs and expectations. If you want to pay (or bill your company) more, and insist on super-plush and a luxurious lobby, try elsewhere. If you enjoy personal service, conscientious employees, open, scenic surroundings with plenty of walking trails, an excellent restaurant just a100 yard walk away, and high quality basics at a great price, try the San Leandro Marina Inn. The continental breakfast is basic but very good, and very carefully tended. A boarding pass printing computer is set up conveniently in the lobby, in addition to the FREE computer room for other needs. The room TVs are new, large flat screens. The walking trails along the bay are great for a short or long walk or run, or just for the view. You dont even have to get on the expressway to get there from the Oakland airport.

For my purposes I enjoy the San Leandro Marina Inn far more than the much higher priced chain hotels.
